name: Hentai Haiku #9 - Traumfaenger
description:
Hentai Haiku #9 - 'Traumfaenger' (Dream Catcher)

"Sex Dolls traversing the Uncanny Valley"

Hentai Haiku is pioneering AI-driven physics-animated 3D characters to achieve rich real-time interactivity for a virtual 'Adult Sandbox', a place to explore all the facets of physical sexual communication, without the massive red tape found in most adult games today.

Come join us!
